name: RecordDailyLivingCosts
0:
”Alexa ask my budget to record 5 dollars on beer”
”Alexa ask my budget to record 5 dollars and 79 cents on food”
”Alexa ask my budget to list costs”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my budget
des: This skill maintains a list of your costs. While it gives a total amount spent for the current day, it also save costs until you clear them.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
